content.en: Capacitor optimization: Researchers have been exploring different algorithms to determine the best placement of capacitors in electric distribution systems. These algorithms, such as the genetic algorithm, mathematical model solution, local search strategy, Harmony Search algorithm, fuzzy approach, and ant colony optimization algorithm, are used to optimize the capacitor placement for reducing power loss and improving voltage profiles. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to find efficient and effective solutions for optimal capacitor allocation in distribution networks.
content.da: Kondensatoroptimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at bestemme den bedste placering af kondensatorer i eldistributionssystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom genetisk algoritme, matematisk model-løsning, lokal søgestrategi, Harmony Search algoritme, fuzzy tilgang og myrekoloni-optimeringsalgoritme, bruges til at optimere kondensatorplaceringen for at reducere effekt tab og forbedre spændingsprofiler. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskere mod at finde effektive og virkningsfulde løsninger til optimal kondensatorallokering i distributionsnetværk.
